title: People living in countries with universal right to vote
subtitle: Based on the classification and assessment by Skaaning et al. (2015). It does not consider informal restrictions or legal restrictions based on age, criminal conviction, incompetence, and local residency.

display.name: No data on right to vote
People living in countries without universal right to vote
with universal right to vote for men only
with universal right to vote for men and women

sourceDesc: Skaaning et al. (2015); Gapminder (v6); HYDE (v3.2); UN (2022)
